item.title: Mysql学习笔记
item.description: 安装 MySql 服务 mac brew install mysql linux sudo apt-get insatll mysql-server sudo apt-get install mysql-client chsh -s `which zsh` 修改密码 sudo mysqld_safe --skin-grant-tables --skip-networking & > use mysql > update user set authentication_string=password('
